address: opcode - description
------------PROGRAM SECTION---------
200: 00e0 - clear screen
202: a22a - set index register = 22a
204: 600c - set register V0 = 0c
206: 6108 - set register V1 = 08
208: d01f - draw 16(F) rows, X = V0, Y = V1
20a: 7009 - add 09 to register V0
20c: a239 - set index register = 239
20e: d01f - draw 16(F) rows, X = V0, Y = V1
210: a248 - set index register = 248
212: 7008 - add 08 to register V0
214: d01f - draw 16(F) rows, X = V0, Y = V1
216: 7004 - add 04 to register V0
218: a257 - set index register = 257
21a: d01f - draw 16(F) rows, X = V0, Y = V1
21c: 7008 - add 08 to register V0
21e: a266 - set index register = 266
220: d01f - draw 16(F) rows, X = V0, Y = V1
222: 7008 - add 08 to register V0
224: a275 - set index register = 275
226: d01f - draw 16(F) rows, X = V0, Y = V1
228: 1228 - jump to address 228 (infinite loop)
------------DATA SECTION------------
------------IBM LOGO----------------
22a: ff00 - 1111111100000000
22c: ff00 - 1111111100000000
22e: 3c00 - 0011110000000000
230: 3c00 - 0011110000000000
232: 3c00 - 0011110000000000
234: 3c00 - 0011110000000000
236: ff00 - 1111111100000000
238: ffff - 1111111111111111
23a: 00ff - 0000000011111111
23c: 0038 - 0000000000111000
23e: 003f - 0000000000111111
240: 003f - 0000000000111111
242: 0038 - 0000000000111000
244: 00ff - 0000000011111111
246: 00ff - 0000000011111111
248: 8000 - 1000000000000000
24a: e000 - 1110000000000000
24c: e000 - 1110000000000000
24e: 8000 - 1000000000000000
250: 8000 - 1000000000000000
252: e000 - 1110000000000000
254: e000 - 1110000000000000
256: 80f8 - 1000000011111000
258: 00fc - 0000000011111100
25a: 003e - 0000000000111110
25c: 003f - 0000000000111111
25e: 003b - 0000000000111011
260: 0039 - 0000000000111001
262: 00f8 - 0000000011111000
264: 00f8 - 0000000011111000
266: 0300 - 0000001100000000
268: 0700 - 0000011100000000
26a: 0f00 - 0000111100000000
26c: bf00 - 1011111100000000
26e: fb00 - 1111101100000000
270: f300 - 1111001100000000
272: e300 - 1110001100000000
274: 43e0 - 0100001111100000
276: 00e0 - 0000000011100000
278: 0080 - 0000000010000000
27a: 0080 - 0000000010000000
27c: 0080 - 0000000010000000
27e: 0080 - 0000000010000000
280: 00e0 - 0000000011100000
282: 00e0 - 0000000011100000
